articles.title: AP Vice President Flies Back
articles.content:
AP Vice President Flies Back
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- John Daniszewski, vice president of the Associated Press of the United States, and his party left for home by air on Thursday.

articles.title: Policy of Attaching Importance to Youth Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
Policy of Attaching Importance to Youth Praised by Foreigners
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Officials of youth organizations from different countries praised the immortal feats performed by the peerlessly great persons in developing the Juche-oriented youth movement after visiting the DPRK.
					 Juan Nogueira Lopez, general secretary of the Communist Youth Collectives of Spain, said:
					
					 While visiting the DPRK, I clearly realized the significance of naming its youth organization after the august name of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The country could have a strong youth organization thanks to the President's idea of attaching importance to the youth.
					
					 The President made a scientific analysis of the position and role of the youth in making a revolution from the dawn of the Korean revolution and wisely led the youth movement.
					
					 Thanks to his original leadership, the Korean youth movement could cover the road of victory.
					
					 Nigatu Dagnachew, chairman of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea, had this to say:
					
					 The Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League founded and developed by the prominent leaders is demonstrating its might as a mass organization strong in the organizing ability, unity and fighting capacity.
					
					 Thanks to the great Songun politics and the policy of attaching importance to the youth, socialism in the DPRK could win one victory after another.
					
					 A member of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League of China said that he was deeply moved to witness the struggle of the diligent and brave young people during his visit to the DPRK.
					
					 The young people of the DPRK are registering great success in building a thriving socialist country, rallied close behind the Workers' Party of Korea headed by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 I hope they will achieve greater success under his leadership.
					
					 Dimitris Palmyris, president of the World Federation of Democratic Youth, said:
					
					 The young Koreans are blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation.
					
					 The Korean youth are fortunate to hold Kim Jong Un, another great man, in high esteem.
					
					  I envy young Koreans dynamically advancing toward a rosy future, united close behind the outstanding leader.
					
					 I am convinced that the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League will as ever play a pivotal role in the activities of the World Federation of Democratic Youth and the youth and students movement.

articles.title: 2012 Ten Best Players, Coaches Selected
articles.content:
2012 Ten Best Players, Coaches Selected
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Ten best athletes and coaches in Juche 101 (2012) were selected in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The players are judoist An Kum Ae, weightlifters Kim Un Guk, Om Yun Chol, Rim Jong Sim and Ryang Chun Hwa, boxer Pak Kyong Ok, wrestler Yang Kyong Il, gymnast Ri Se Gwang and model plane operators Ri Kwang Il and Kim Won Chol. They proved successful at the 30th Olympic Games, world and Asian championships and other international and national games that took place last year. 
					
					 The best coaches include Ryu Ju Song, Pak Ki Song, Ri Chun Gyong and Kim Chun Hui, who were in charge of DPRK judoists and weightlifters during the 30th Olympic Games.

articles.title: DPRK Students Engaged in Social Activities
articles.content:
DPRK Students Engaged in Social Activities
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- University students in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are carrying on social activities during their vocation, in an effort to implement the tasks laid in the New Year address of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 Tens of thousands of students from 10 odd universities and colleges in Pyongyang, including Kim Il Sung University, found themselves at the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex to give a helping hand to its employees.
					
					 They volunteered to carry more than 1,000 tons of materials, remove a large amount of earth and improve ditches and handed over abundant aid materials to the complex.
					
					 Ji Un Gyong, a student of Kim Chol Ju University of Education, told KCNA:
					
					 "I was deeply impressed by the employees working devotedly for the country. Their devoted work made me resolve to study harder for the nation's development."
					
					 Students also conducted socio-political activities at light industrial establishments and on co-op farms.
					
					 Those in North Phyongan Province spent some of vacation days at the Sinuiju Shoes Factory and on Sinam Co-op Farm in Ryongchon County.
					
					 Students in North Hamgyong and Hwanghae provinces visited Kim Chaek and Hwanghae iron and steel complexes and other major factories and enterprises to encourage the workers to effect fresh upsurge in production.
					
					 Yun Myong Guk, a student of Kim Je Won Haeju University of Agriculture, said that during the winter vacation he would do good things to be kept long in my memory.

articles.title: Zeal for Physical Culture Grows
articles.content:
Zeal for Physical Culture Grows
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- A table-tennis tournament recently took place at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium with attendance of officials from commissions, ministries and national institutions.
					 During the tournament, the stadium was crowded with spectators and cheers.
					
					 The tournament drew deep interest of sports experts and fans and stirred up the people's enthusiasm for sports activities. It also helped improve techniques of those participants.
					
					 Kim Yong Thae, a director of the Ministry of Food Procurement and Administration, told KCNA:
					
					 "I am very glad that my team took the title. It is hard to believe that my table-tennis skill, trained in holidays and other occasions, resulted in such victory.
					
					 I'll take more active part in sports activities and thus contribute to building a civilized socialist nation."
					
					 Pak Song Guk, vice-chairman of the State Commission of Quality Management, said:
					
					 "My heart was full of deep emotion when employees of the commission warmly congratulated us for having won the doubles.
					
					 I will contribute a large share to building an economic giant with the spirit displayed in the tournament."
					
					 Kang Tong Chol, a Pyongyang citizen, said:
					
					 "Physical culture is an important part of life as it trains one's body and mind and raises working ability.
					
					 I like playing table-tennis. The tournament made me so hot."

articles.title: Korean Youths Blessed with Peerlessly Great Men
articles.content:
Korean Youths Blessed with Peerlessly Great Men
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The youths in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have displayed their dignity and honor under the deep care of the peerlessly great men.
					 They are now playing the pivotal role in developing the country, honored with such titles as the special detachment of the supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, a reliable companion of the Workers' Party of Korea and the most vital force of society.
					
					 Early in the 20th century, President Kim Il Sung organized the Young Communist League of Korea.
					
					 On January 17, Juche 35 (1946), the Democratic Youth League of North Korea was founded under his wise guidance so that the young people could push ahead with building a new society, closely rallied around the banner of democracy.
					
					 In high appreciation of their achievements, the President saw to it that edifices built by them were called after "Chongnyon" (youth) in Korean words. 
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il authored such celebrated works as "The Present Times and the Tasks Facing Young People" and "Let Us Exalt the Brilliance of Comrade Kim Il Sung's Idea on the Youth Movement and the Achievements Made under His Leadership" to show the road ahead of the youth movement at every stage and in every period of the social development.
					
					 He took measures to rename the youth league Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and institute the Youth Day and personally conferred the flag of the League on the youths. He also put forward a slogan "Love Youth!", showing all sorts of loving care for the young people.
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un is now carrying forward the idea of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on giving importance to the youth.
					
					 In January last year, he sent to the youth his autographic letters reading "The Building of a Thriving Nation Will Be Accelerated by the Vigorous Drive of the Youth. Always Advance Straight Forward Following the Party!" 
					
					 Today the Korean youths successfully play the role of vanguard and shock brigade in the drive for building a thriving nation under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, reliably inheriting the tradition and mental mainstay established by the preceding generations.

articles.title: Dozens of Poems Created
articles.content:
Dozens of Poems Created
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Poets under the Central Committee of the Writers Union of Korea created dozens of poems and words of songs in the first week of the new year.
					 Such poems as "Let Us Go for Great Victory" and "Our Strength, Banner of Victory" praise the greatness of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, noting that his ringing voice would always be cherished in the hearts of the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Poems "Footsteps of the DPRK in the Year 2013" and "With the Same Spirit and Mettle As Were Displayed in Conquering Space" fully represent the firm will of all the service personnel and people to successfully carry out the tasks set forth in the New Year Address of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Poem "Let's Dedicate Springtime of Life to Country " and words of songs "Dreamful Girl in Sepho" and "Let Youth Go Ahead" fully represent the unanimous determination of the youth to make a breakthrough towards victory in every worksite for great surge in response to the Party's call.

articles.title: Chopsticks, One of Eating Tools Peculiar to Koreans
articles.content:
Chopsticks, One of Eating Tools Peculiar to Koreans
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The Korean people have used chopsticks in taking meals from olden times.
					 In this regard, Pak Yong Hae, a candidate academician at the Academy of Social Sciences, told KCNA:
					
					 Using chopsticks is good for hand and brain development.
					
					 About 1.5 billion people use chopsticks in the world, most of them in Korea, China and Japan.
					
					 It is believed that chopsticks came into being in Korea, following spoons. The use of spoons and chopsticks is related to the Korean national diet made up of soup and dish.
					
					 Koreans have used metal chopsticks while Chinese and Japanese wooden ones.
					
					 From childhood, they take up, with chopsticks, a piece of salted perilla leaves, jelly, boiled beans in soysauce and others. It is believed that 64 muscles and some 30 joints in human body move simultaneously when picking up a dish with chopsticks. Such movement gives effect on the brain proper, and it is helpful to preventing dementia among the aged.
					
					 Thus, the Koreans' diet culture has developed along with chopsticks.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls on Officials to Work Hard for People
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls on Officials to Work Hard for People
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- "Everything for the people and everything by relying on them!" all officials should regard this slogan as basic guidelines and maxim in their life and work and thoroughly apply it to all fields. Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in an editorial.
					 This slogan reflects the noble intention of the Workers' Party of Korea loving the people and attaching importance to them and tells the precious truth that with what idea and view the officials should work, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 The WPK is the party struggling for the people and is always emerging victorious with them by firmly believing in them.
					
					 It is the steadfast will of the WPK to build the most powerful country in this land by relying on the people where their ideal and desire are blooming.
					
					 It is none other than the officials who should become vanguard fighters in following the idea and intention of the leader and upholding the party's cause.
					
					 They should place the people before anybody else and regard the love and dedication to them as a moral obligation and bounden duty as they have grown up under the care of the great mother party regarding the people as the dearest one.
					
					 It is an important issue related to the work for consolidating the single-minded unity as firm as a rock to improve the ideological viewpoint and work style of the officials. 
					
					 All officials should radically improve the ideological viewpoint and work style, true to the New Year Address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un, and discharge their responsibility and duty in the struggle for a final victory in building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Bolstering up Nation's Defence Capability
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Bolstering up Nation's Defence Capability
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Strength of armed forces means national power and vice versa.
					 Rodong Sinmun on Thursday says this in a bylined article. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 This is the truth the DPRK army and people have deeply grasped through the confrontation with the imperialists.
					
					 No country in the world is exposed to such incessant blatant military pressure and threat of aggression from the U.S. as the DPRK.
					
					 After the demise of the Cold War the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces ran amuck to stifle the DPRK which was advancing under the uplifted red banner of socialism.
					
					 But for the DPRK's powerful arms, the imperialists would have provoked a war of aggression on the Korean Peninsula already long ago.
					
					 The reality of the DPRK that it is honorably safeguarding the national dignity and sovereignty in the military confrontation with the U.S. imperialists, holding aloft the banner of Songun, eloquently proves that military power means national power.
					
					 Any neglect of the work to build military muscle would hinder economic development in a country no matter how economy, science and technology developed. This would result in placing it under the control of the imperialists.
					
					 The peace and security of humankind are gravely threatened worldwide due to the imperialists' interference and military aggression against sovereign states, and the Asia-Pacific region including the Korean Peninsula, in particular, has become the biggest hotspot in the world. It is quite natural for the DPRK to bolster up its military capability under this situation. 
					
					 Steadfast is the will of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government to reliably protect the security and sovereignty of the country and peace and security in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world by dint of tremendous military muscle.

articles.title: KCNA Urges Japan to Make Decision to Break with Disgraceful Past
articles.content:
KCNA Urges Japan to Make Decision to Break with Disgraceful Past
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- New Prime Minister of Japan Abe made reckless remarks totally denying the history of its past crimes after coming to power, touching off international public criticism.
					 At a press conference held on Dec. 31 last year Abe expressed his will to reexamine the statement made by the former Japanese government in which it apologized for the crimes committed in the past including sexual slavery.
					
					 The New York Times on Jan. 3 strongly censured his outbursts as a shameful behavior, recalling that Abe did not hide his intention to rewrite the war history from long ago.
					
					 This is the international community's deserved curse and denunciation of the present Japanese government which started its office by negating the crime-woven history.
					
					 Japan is the special war criminal state which inflicted human, material and spiritual damage upon Korea and other Asian countries in the past century through aggression and colonial policy.
					
					 The sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army was the hideous state-sponsored crime committed through the direct involvement of the government and the military by the order and approval of Japan's king. This had already been clearly proved by a lot of historical materials.
					
					 That is why voices demanding the Japanese government's official admission to its past crimes and its apology and reparation for them are heard from different parts of the world including the U.S. even at this moment.
					
					 Abe as a grandson of a top war criminal should have felt ashamed of those crimes more than any others and taken the lead in liquidating them.
					
					 This being a hard reality, he let loose a spate of vituperation that there is no evidence proving the coercive nature involved in the sexual slavery and cried out for reexamination of the statement made by Kono. This cannot but be interpreted as the height of moral vulgarity.
					
					 Japan's settlement of its past crimes is an urgent international issue directly linked with peace and stability in Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are working hard to evade this responsibility as they are obsessed with a militarist ambition for reinvasion.
					
					 They are regarding the honest apology and reparation for the past wrongdoings as an obstacle to their revanchist moves for reinvasion.
					
					 Precisely for this reason, they have persistently worked to provide institutional mechanisms and bolster up the military capability for reinvasion while being busy with farces to deny the past crimes and distort the history.
					
					 They have become evermore undisguised in their moves for militarization in recent years.
					
					 They are getting frantic in their moves to turn all fabrics of society to the Right and militarize them as evidenced by the formation of the Cabinet with maniacs praising the Japanese imperialists' aggression and the moves to deny the past crimes and reexamination of the proposal for the revision of the Constitution for the exercise of the right to collective self-defense.
					
					  This is, however, no more than the foolish act of those obsessed with a daydream.
					
					 How Japan approaches its past history is a touchstone showing whether it will achieve progress and prosperity as a normal state and pacifist state or remain a state for militarist aggression and go to its final ruin.
					
					 Now is time for Japan to break not only with its disgraceful history of crimes but with the inglorious past when the country defended and embellished it.
					
					 The Japanese authorities would be well advised to face up to the past, the present and the future and make a right bold decision.

articles.title: S. Korean Constitutional Court's Unjust Ruling Protested
articles.content:
S. Korean Constitutional Court's Unjust Ruling Protested
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification issued a commentary on Jan. 10 denouncing the puppet Constitutional Court for its unjust ruling. 
					 The commentary accused the Constitutional Court of ruling last year that it is not illegal to make a surprise search for e-mail without prior notice "in case of urgency".
					
					 The use of ambiguous words "in case of urgency" helped security investigation organs apply them as they please and intensify watch and control over people, the commentary charged.
					
					 The recent ruling is an astonishing action to allow the unlimited arbitrary practices of the security authorities and intensify suppression, it said.
					
					 The surprise search is aimed to crack down on the movement for independence, democracy and reunification, it said, deploring the act of disregarding human rights of people.
					
					 It stressed the need to fight against the security authorities' act against democracy and human rights.

articles.title: S. Korean Intelligence Service Accused of Human Rights Abuses
articles.content:
S. Korean Intelligence Service Accused of Human Rights Abuses
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The Kyonggi Solidarity for Progress in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Jan. 13 at which it denounced the Intelligence Service for illegally following up a member of a progressive organization.
					 At the press conference speakers accused the IS of illegally shadowing Ri Sang Ho, advisor to the Suwon Solidarity for Progress, for several days and insisting this was a proper performance of its duty.
					
					 This is a serious abuse of human rights, they said, strongly condemning the IS for justifying its illegal act.
					
					 If the authorities overlook the recent case, they will face all-people resistance, they warned.
					
					 Victim Ri Sang Ho held that the illegal surveillance should not be allowed to go on as it disturbs the normal life of people and puts them in uneasiness at all times.

articles.title: Persons of Mt. Paektu Registered as Honorary Citizens of Ecuador
articles.content:
Persons of Mt. Paektu Registered as Honorary Citizens of Ecuador
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Deleg City of Ecuador decided to register President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il, anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and the dear respected Kim Jong Un as its honorary citizens.
					 A decision of the city government on awarding the title of honorary citizen to them was adopted on January 8.

articles.title: New Year Address Favored by Indian Political Party
articles.content:
New Year Address Favored by Indian Political Party
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's New Year Address was fully supported by Debabrata Biswas, general secretary of the Central Committee of the All-India Forward Bloc.
					 He said when meeting with the DPRK ambassador to his country on January 10:
					
					 Kim Jong Un's historic New Year Address startled the world.
					
					 It is a precious document as it indicates the orientation and ways to be held fast to by the Korean people in the revolutionary struggle and construction.
					
					 It is the great honor and pride for the Korean people to have Kim Jong Un at the top posts of the party, state and army as he is steadfastly carrying forward the revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Sure is the victory of the Korean people in their revolutionary cause thanks to the outstanding and tested leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The orientation and ways for achieving Korea's reunification set forth by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address are fundamental guidelines to be held fast to by all Koreans in the struggle for achieving the cause of reunification.
					
					 I am sure that the Korean people will achieve great success in building an economic power and accomplishing the cause of national reunification this year under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: New Year Address Studied by Political Figures of Different Countries
articles.content:
New Year Address Studied by Political Figures of Different Countries
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Reading sessions on the dear respected Kim Jong Un's New Year Address were held by the Workers' Party of Mexico, the Romanian Socialist Union and the United Left Movement of Dominica on January 5 and 9.
					 Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, said he deemed it a great honor to hold a reading session on Kim Jong Un's New Year Address as the first political event of the party in 2013. He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un reviewed epoch-making miracles and changes made by the party, army and people of the DPRK last year by turning sorrow over the sudden passing of leader Kim Jong Il into strength and courage. He put forward this year's tasks for dynamically advancing the building of a thriving nation and the cause of national reunification and developing foreign relations.
					
					 The DPRK is a country strong in independence in which all people are firmly rallied behind the party and leader with a single mind and a power which has bolstered up its defence capability in every way by enforcing the great Songun politics.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Mexico is rejoiced over the great successes registered by the DPRK last year in the efforts to build a socialist thriving nation and achieve independent national reunification under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un and sincerely hail them.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Mexico will always stand by the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK.
					
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Romanian Socialist Union, and Jose Miguel Mejia, secretary general of the United Left Movement of Dominica, said the cause of independence, the cause of Songun pioneered and led by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They expressed full support to the tasks and ways for building a thriving nation and achieving national reunification indicated by him in his New Year Address.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Personality as Great Man Praised by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Personality as Great Man Praised by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- A paper of Democratic Congo and an Italian broadcasting service praised the personality of the dear respected Kim Jong Un as a great man on Jan. 8 and 9.
					 Paper of Democratic Congo L'Avenir carried articles under different titles illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Un standing on the tribune of honor of the square where a parade took place in celebration of the centenary of birth of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung.
					
					 In an article titled "Global attention" the paper introduced the undying Songun revolutionary leadership feats of Kim Jong Un, referring to the fact that he has been praised by many media of the world as a man of the year.
					
					 An article titled "Successful launch of satellite" said the DPRK's successful satellite launch demonstrated once again its national power.
					
					 Radio of Italy Citta Aperta said the Korean people are filled with great pride and self-confidence of holding Kim Jong Un as the supreme leader of the party, state and army.
					
					 Kim Jong Un has devoted everything to the happiness of the Korean people and prosperity of the country, carrying forward the revolutionary cause of leader Kim Jong Il, said the radio, adding:
					
					 Great are the feats he performed by leading all the affairs of the country last year.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is the leader and great father of the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let's Dynamically Struggle for a Final Victory, Holding Aloft the Banner of Songun" was brought out in pamphlet by the Slavina Publishing House of Bulgaria on January 5.
					 The work published on April 15, Juche 101 (2012) clarifies the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation is a history which clearly proves the immutable truth that an outstanding leader assures the dignity and prosperity of the country and nation. 
					
					 It also deals with the idea that the ever-victorious history of the Korean People's Army firmly guarantees the glorious 100-year history of Juche Korea and the eternal history of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 It sets forth the tasks to be fulfilled to demonstrate the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Russia
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- A detailed gist of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "On Effecting a Drastic Turn in Land Management to Meet the Requirements for Building a Thriving Socialist Nation" was posted by the All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks of Russia on its website on January 4.
					 The work, published on April 27, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the immortal feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in land administration and indicates the general orientation and tasks for face-lifting the land as befitting that of a socialist thriving nation.
					
					 The website carried a photo of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Regresa la delegacion de agencia noticiera norteamericana AP
articles.content:
Regresa la delegacion de agencia noticiera norteamericana AP
Pyongyang, 17 de enero (ACNC) -- Regresaron el dia 17 por via aerea el vicepresidente de la agencia noticiera norteamericana AP, John Daniszewski y su comitiva.

articles.title: Seleccionados 10 jugadores y entrenadores mejores de 2012
articles.content:
Seleccionados 10 jugadores y entrenadores mejores de 2012
Pyongyang, 17 de enero (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea fueron seleccionados 10 jugadores y entrenadores mejores del 101 (2012) de la Era Juche: la judoca An Kum Ae, el pesista Kim Un Guk, el pesista Om Yun Chol, la pesista Rim Jong Sim, la boxeadora Pak Kyong Ok, la pesista Ryang Chun Hwa, el luchador Yang Kyong Il, el gimnasta Ri Se Gwang y los aeromodelistas Ri Kwang Il y Kim Won Chol.
					Ellos sobresalieron en los XXX Juegos Olimpicos, los campeonatos mundiales y asiaticos y otras competencias internacionales y nacionales efectuadas el ano pasado.
					
					Entre los entrenadores sobresalientes figuran Ryu Ju Song, Pak Ki Song, Ri Chun Gyong y Kim Chun Hui quienes entrenaron a los judocas y pesistas participantes en los XXX Juegos Olimpicos.

articles.title: Poderio militar es el estatal, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Poderio militar es el estatal, apunta Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 17 de enero (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun divulgo este jueves un articulo individual senalando que el poderio militar es el estatal y viceversa. 
					Esta verdad ha sido comprobada por el ejercito y pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en la confrontacion con el imperialismo, destaca el articulo y continua: 
					
					En el mundo no hay otro pais como la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que vive bajo la brutal presion militar y constante amenaza de agresion de Estados Unidos 
					
					Despues del fin de la guerra fria, el imperialismo norteamericano y otras fuerzas aliadas imperialistas se abalanzaron para aplastar a la RPDC que marcha enarbolando la bandera roja del socialismo. 
					
					Si la RPDC no hubiera fortalecido las fuerzas armadas, ya se habria desatado en la Peninsula Coreana la guerra de agresion imperialista. 
					
					La realidad de la RPDC, que bajo la bandera del Songun, defiende honrosamente la dignidad y la soberania nacionales en la confrontacion militar con el imperialismo norteamericano, evidencia que la capacidad militar es precisamente el poderio estatal. 
					
					Si un pais menosprecia el aumento de fuerza militar, sera obstaculizado su desarrollo economico aunque fuera avanzado en la ciencia y tecnica. Hasta puede ser colonizado por los imperialistas.
					
					En la actualidad, debido a la intervencion y agresion militar de los imperialistas contra los Estados soberanos, se ven amenazadas gravemente la paz y la seguridad de la humanidad y la region de Asia-Pacifico, incluso la Peninsula Coreana, devino punto mas candente del mundo. 
					
					Es invariable la voluntad del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el gobierno de la RPDC de defender con formidable poderio militar la seguridad de la patria y la soberania nacional y preservar la paz y seguridad del Nordeste Asiatico y el resto del mundo.

articles.title: ACNC urge a Japon romper con el pasado vergonzoso
articles.content:
ACNC urge a Japon romper con el pasado vergonzoso 
Pyongyang, 17 de enero (ACNC) -- Desde el comienzo de su mandato, el nuevo premier japones Abe niega totalmente la historia criminal de su pais, provocando censura de la sociedad internacional. 
					En una rueda de prensa concedida el 31 de diciembre pasado, Abe expreso la voluntad de revisar la declaracion del gobierno anterior en cuanto al tema de pedir disculpas por el caso de esclavas sexuales y otros crimenes del pasado. 
					
					Al respecto, el periodico estadounidense The New York Times revela en su edicion del dia 3 que "desde hace mucho tiempo Abe no ocultaba  su idea de rescribir la historia de guerra" y lo califica de "accion vergonzosa". 
					
					Esto es la denuncia merecida de la sociedad internacional al actual gobierno japones que niega la historia llena de crimenes desde primeros dias de su mandato. 
					
					Japon es el criminal de guerra de primera categoria que en el siglo pasado acarreo incontables perdidas humanas, materiales y mentales con su agresion y politica colonial contra Corea y otros paises asiaticos. 
					
					Muchos datos historicos revelan que el caso de esclavas sexuales para el viejo ejercito japones fue un archi-crimen estatal cometido directamente de modo forzoso por el gobierno y la capa militar segun el mandato y aprobacion del emperador japones. 
					
					Es por eso que en Estados Unidos. y otros rincones del mundo se alzan las voces que demandan al gobierno japones reconocer sus crimenes del pasado y pedir disculpas y hacer indemnizacion por el respecto. 
					
					El premier Abe, nieto de un criminal de guerra de primer grado, ha de sentir la verguenza de ello y estar al frente de la liquidacion del pasado. 
					
					Sin embargo, vuelve a decir que no se han descubierto los testigos del caso de esclavas sexuales e insiste en la revision de la declaracion de Kono, lo cual es el climax de la bajeza moral. 
					
					La liquidacion del pasado de Japon es un inminente asunto internacional que esta relacionado directamente con la paz y la estabilidad de Asia y el resto del mundo. 
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses eluden sus crimenes porque todavia estan enloquecidos por la ambicion militarista de nueva agresion. 
					
					Ahora los reaccionarios japoneses consideran que el reconocimiento y la indemnizacion por su pasado criminal ponen obstaculos a sus maniobras de nueva agresion. 
					
					Por eso, niegan sus crimenes del pasado, tergiversan la historia y recurren tenazmente a preparar los aparatos institucionales favorables a la nueva agresion y aumentar sus fuerzas militares. 
					
					Se torna mas abierta en los ultimos tiempos la militarizacion del pais isla. 
					
					El gabinete fue reorganizado por los maniacos que encomian los crimenes de agresion del pasado. Y se hace cada dia mas derechista y militarista la sociedad japonesa mediante la negacion de la historia criminal y la revision de la enmienda de la constitucion para el ejercicio del derecho de defensa colectiva. 
					
					Hoy dia, la posicion  sobre la historia del pasado es la piedra de toque que determina el desarrollo y prosperidad de Japon como un Estado normal y pacifista  o la ruina como pais agresor militarista. 
					
					Las autoridades japonesas deben tomar la correcta decision dandose clara cuenta del pasado, el presente y el futuro.
